common.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
common.cannotDeleteLastClinic: Cannot delete the last clinic. Create another clinic in a different workspace first.
common.cannotDeleteLastWorkspace: Cannot delete the last workspace with clinics. Create another workspace with at least one clinic first.
common.createNewDescription: Enter the information to create a new {entity}

header.title: Initial setup
header.subtitle: We guide you step by step so your prices reflect the reality of your clinic.

loading.subtitle: Hold on, we're getting everything ready for you.

progress.title: Overall progress
progress.description: Move at your own pace. You can revisit any step whenever you need to adjust data.
progress.label: Your progress

primaryPanel.title: Primary action
primaryPanel.description: Focus on the main action and refresh when you finish to mark this step as complete.

guide.title: Key points
guide.description: Before you continue, make sure these points are covered.

navigation.caption: Step {index} of {total}
navigation.locked: Finish the current step before moving on.

nextSection.title: What's next?
nextSection.description: With your financial foundation ready, focus on caring for patients and measuring results. These actions help you make the most of the setup.

patients.title: Create your first patient
patients.description: Store history, preferences, and active treatments in one place.

treatments.title: Design a treatment
treatments.description: Combine services and recipes, assign timing, and calculate margins instantly.

services.title: Share your catalog
services.description: Use final tariffs to build promo bundles and communicate prices.

cta.finish: Complete setup and open the dashboard

nextSection.note: When every step is green you can finish the setup. You can always edit the data later.

toasts.checkError: We couldn't verify your progress. Try again in a moment.
toasts.workspaceMissing: Could not load workspace. Please try refreshing the page.
toasts.finishSuccess: Great! Let's keep moving to the next step.

depreciation.title: Equipment depreciation
depreciation.caption: Record the assets you use for each treatment.
depreciation.description: Determine how much each piece of equipment costs per month so the real cost is distributed fairly across your services.

points.0: Create an asset for every relevant tool or piece of equipment.
points.1: Enter purchase cost, useful life, and residual value.
points.2: Assign the assets to the services that use them.

depreciation.tip: If you're unsure about useful life, start with 36 months for mid-range equipment and adjust later.

reflection.title: Are all critical pieces of equipment covered?
reflection.description: Missing assets will undervalue your services and hurt your margin.

fixed_costs.title: Monthly fixed costs
fixed_costs.caption: Your financial baseline regardless of patient volume.
fixed_costs.description: Detail the expenses you pay every month so you know how much you must bill to cover them.

points.0: List your fixed expenses (rent, salaries, software, etc.).
points.1: Tag an owner or label so you can find them quickly.
points.2: Double-check that amounts and dates are up to date.

fixed_costs.tip: Group expenses by category (operations, staff, marketing) to analyze them more easily.

reflection.title: Do you know your monthly break-even point?
reflection.description: With this data you can estimate it and set realistic revenue goals.

cost_per_min.title: Cost per minute
cost_per_min.caption: The foundation for profitable pricing.
cost_per_min.description: Set the typical duration of your services and how much each minute of your team costs.

points.0: Define the standard duration for each type of service.
points.1: Enter the hourly rate of the staff who performs it.
points.2: Add prep or cleanup time when needed.

cost_per_min.tip: Start with the actual time observed and refine it with historical data.

reflection.title: Does the configured time reflect reality?
reflection.description: If you underestimate minutes, your prices will fall below your costs.

supplies.title: Supplies and presentations
supplies.caption: Control every material you use in your services.
supplies.description: Upload supplies, define presentations, and portion them to know the exact cost per service.

points.0: Register each supply with its most recent price.
points.1: Define how you buy it (presentation) and how you use it (portion).
points.2: Set a minimum stock so you don't run out unexpectedly.

supplies.tip: Add providers so you can quickly spot who offers the best cost.

reflection.title: Do you know how much each portion used costs?
reflection.description: That value feeds your service recipes automatically.

service_recipe.title: Service recipes
service_recipe.caption: Every material and timing detail per treatment.
service_recipe.description: Define which supplies and labor each service needs to calculate the full cost.

points.0: Pick the service and add every supply with its quantity.
points.1: Include staff time and equipment involved.
points.2: Save the recipe and review it with the team to validate.

service_recipe.tip: Create versions by complexity (basic, premium) to offer profitable alternatives.

reflection.title: Is your team following this recipe step by step?
reflection.description: When everyone uses it, you standardize cost and quality.

tariffs.title: Tariffs and rounding
tariffs.caption: Turn your costs into clear patient-facing prices.
tariffs.description: Define target margins, rounding rules, and taxes so prices are ready to publish.

points.0: Select the target margin for each service.
points.1: Configure rounding rules and currency to communicate simple prices.
points.2: Confirm that any applicable taxes are included.

tariffs.tip: Use different margin rules for acquisition versus retention services.

reflection.title: Do the final prices sustain your expected margin?
reflection.description: Review the simulation before sharing it with the team or patients.

profile.title: Profile

advanced.retention_low_desc: Implement urgent follow-up program and analyze causes of churn

marketing.ratio_acceptable_desc: Ratio 1-2x is acceptable. Consider optimizing channels
marketing.ratio_critical_desc: Ratio <1x is critical. Not sustainable, review strategy urgently
marketing.declining_acquisition_desc: Review your marketing strategy and optimize channels

marketing.cac_improving_desc: Your CAC is decreasing. Excellent job optimizing your marketing investment

equilibrium.title: Break-even Point

calculation.title: Break-even Calculation
calculation.description: Minimum monthly revenue needed to avoid losses

inputs.contributionMarginHelp: Percentage remaining after deducting variable costs

formula.title: Calculation Formula

warning.title: Important Information
warning.missingData: For accurate calculations, make sure you have configured:

summary.title: Plain Language Summary
summary.subtitle: Understanding your break-even point in simple terms
summary.line1: Your clinic needs {breakEven} per month to cover all fixed costs (break-even point).
summary.line2: With a {safetyMargin} safety margin, your monthly target is {monthlyTarget}, which means {dailyTarget} per day across {workDays} work days.
summary.line3: You currently have {currentRevenue} in revenue this month. You need {revenueGap} more to reach your target, which requires approximately {days} days at current pace.
summary.line3_goalReached: Congratulations! You've reached your monthly target of {monthlyTarget}. Keep up the excellent work!
summary.goalMessage: You've successfully reached your monthly target! Continue monitoring to maintain profitability.

simulation.variable_cost_calculated: Calculated: {value} (based on {sample} treatments over the last {days} days)

validation.workDays: Work days must be between 1 and 31
validation.variableCost: Variable cost percentage must be between 0 and 100
validation.safetyMargin: Safety margin must be between 0 and 200
validation.manualTarget: Manual target must be a positive number

v0_2_0.title: Premium Dark Mode & Setup Wizard
added: Premium Dark Mode: Complete redesign with modern palette inspired by Notion/Linear
Setup Wizard: Complete step-by-step onboarding system
Auto-cleanup: Automatic detection of ghost data in localStorage
RLS Diagnostics: SQL scripts to verify policy status
Requirements System: Progressive validation of initial configuration
improved: service_recipe requirement now more flexible (allows services without supplies)
Dark mode with better contrast and visual hierarchy
fixed: Fix infinite loop in assets configuration
Fix missing RLS policies in operational tables
Fix triggers failing due to missing SECURITY DEFINER
Fix ghost clinics after database reset
Fix guard allowing critical onboarding steps to be skipped
Fix multiple UX issues in onboarding modal

v0_1_0.title: Initial Release
added: Apple-style UI with Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
ui: Base components: DataTable, FormModal, PageHeader, etc.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Laralis, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement. If you do not agree to these Terms of Service, please do not use our service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: Laralis is a dental practice management platform that provides tools for patient management, treatment tracking, expense control, and financial analysis. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the service at any time without prior notice.

registration.title: 3. User Registration
registration.content: To use Laralis, you must register and create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to provide accurate and complete information during registration.

dataUsage.title: 4. Use of Data
dataUsage.content: You retain all rights to the data you enter into Laralis. We do not claim ownership of your data and will not use it for purposes other than providing and improving our service. You are responsible for maintaining backups of your data.

privacy.title: 5. Privacy
privacy.content: Your use of Laralis is also governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand our practices regarding the collection and use of your personal information.

prohibitedUse.title: 6. Prohibited Use
prohibitedUse.content: You agree not to use Laralis for any unlawful purpose or in any way that could damage, disable, or impair the service. You may not attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the service or any systems or networks connected to the service.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Laralis is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use the service, including loss of data, profits, or business opportunities.

modifications.title: 8. Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. We will notify users of significant changes through the platform or by email. Continued use of the service after modifications constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate these Terms of Service. You may cancel your account at any time through the settings page.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at support@laralis.com

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: At Laralis, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our dental practice management platform.

dataCollection.title: 2. Information We Collect
dataCollection.content:
We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
• Account information (name, email, password)
• Practice information (clinic name, address, contact details)
• Patient data (names, contact information, treatment records)
• Financial data (expenses, revenue, costs)
• Usage data (how you interact with our platform)

dataUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
dataUse.content:
We use the collected information to:
• Provide and maintain our service
• Improve and personalize your experience
• Communicate with you about updates and support
• Ensure security and prevent fraud
• Comply with legal obligations

dataStorage.title: 4. Data Storage and Security
dataStorage.content: Your data is stored securely using industry-standard encryption and security practices. We use Supabase as our database provider, which implements enterprise-grade security measures. We implement access controls to ensure that only authorized users can access your data.

dataSharing.title: 5. Information Sharing
dataSharing.content:
We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
• With your explicit consent
• To comply with legal obligations
• With service providers who assist in operating our platform (under strict confidentiality agreements)
• To protect the rights and safety of Laralis and our users

userRights.title: 6. Your Rights
userRights.content:
You have the right to:
• Access your personal data
• Correct inaccurate data
• Request deletion of your data
• Export your data
• Object to processing of your data
• Withdraw consent at any time

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage, and maintain your session. You can control cookie settings through your browser, but some features may not function properly if cookies are disabled.

dataRetention.title: 8. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. When you delete your account, we will delete or anonymize your personal data within 90 days, unless required by law to retain it longer.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through a prominent notice on our platform. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.content:
If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

Email: privacy@laralis.com

We will respond to your inquiry within 30 days.

heroPricing.title: Your Intelligent Pricing System
heroPricing.subtitle: We calculate every price automatically based on your real costs

modal.title: How Does the Pricing System Work?
modal.subtitle: Understanding how we calculate your prices automatically

step1.title: Step 1: Fixed Costs per Minute
step1.description: We add all your monthly expenses (rent, salaries, equipment depreciation) and divide them by the effective working minutes.
step1.example:
Rent: {rent} + Salaries: {salaries} + Depreciation: {depreciation} = Total: {total}
Divided by {minutes} minutes = {perMinute}/minute

step2.title: Step 2: Variable Costs (Materials)
step2.description: We add the cost of all materials and supplies needed to perform the procedure according to the service recipe.

step3.title: Step 3: Add Your Profit Margin
step3.description: We add the profit percentage you want to earn. This margin covers unforeseen costs, investment and net profit.

value.title: Why is this valuable?
value.point1: Never lose money: Every price covers ALL your real costs
value.point2: Fair and competitive prices: Based on math, not assumptions
value.point3: Automatic updates: If your costs change, prices update
value.point4: Total transparency: You know exactly what each price includes

breakEvenProgress.title: Monthly Goal
breakEvenProgress.subtitle: Progress toward your break-even point
breakEvenProgress.projection: At current pace, you'll reach the goal in {days} days out of {remaining} remaining
breakEvenProgress.atRisk: ⚠️ You need to accelerate the pace to reach the goal this month

suggestion.title: 💡 Suggestion to reach the goal
suggestion.message: You need to generate {daily} daily for the next {remainingDays} days

breakEvenProgress.noRevenueHelp: You have {remaining} working days left to reach your goal. Start recording treatments to see your real progress.

dateFilter.summary: Viewing {period} broken down by {granularity}, compared with {comparison}

marketingROI.title: Marketing ROI
marketingROI.description: Return on investment by monthly period
marketingROI.noDataHint: Register expenses with 'Marketing' or 'Advertising' category to see ROI analysis

help.title: How does this analysis work?
help.description: Calculates ROI based on registered marketing expenses and revenue/patients from the same period. Make sure to categorize your marketing expenses correctly.

marketingTimeline.title: Marketing Timeline
marketingTimeline.description: Correlation between marketing events and revenue

marketingCorrelation.title: Marketing Impact
marketingCorrelation.noDataHint: Register your campaigns to see ROI analysis here

insights.lowROIWarning: Consider optimizing or pausing this platform

serviceROI.title: Service Profitability Analysis
serviceROI.description: Analysis based on real completed treatment data
serviceROI.noDataHint: Complete some treatments to see profitability analysis

totalProfit.title: Services by Total Profit
totalProfit.description: Sorted by total profit generated (most important)

profitPerUnit.title: Services by Profit per Sale
profitPerUnit.description: Identify hidden gems: high profit but low sales

matrix.starsDesc: High profit, high frequency - Keep it up!
matrix.gemsDesc: High profit, low frequency - Promote more!
matrix.volumeDesc: Low profit, high frequency - Optimize pricing
matrix.reviewDesc: Low profit, low frequency - Evaluate if worth keeping

opportunities.title: Growth Opportunities
opportunities.description: Money you're leaving on the table

profitSimulator.title: Monthly Profit Simulator
profitSimulator.description: Calculate how much you'll earn based on patients attended

simulator.title: What if I see more patients?
simulator.description: Select how many extra patients you would see (in addition to break-even)
